content: Why does GitHub always show nikomatsakis as the one deploying the dev-guide? When I click on the branch it claims he pushed to, it shows that the commit was authored by @traviscibot. Does this have some connection to @nikomatsakis-admin? Anyway, just curious :)
I believe it's because he set up the repo and the original CI. My guess is that the setup is tied to his personal token or something.
